title: I need help.
body:
I am having a problem. I live in a country call Guyana and my isp blocks all the ports to play league of legends. I tried to port forward (did everything right) and still it did not work. I called my isp and they said my internet package does not support live streaming, playing online games, etc.

Can you please help me solve this problem.

replies.body: Your best bet may be to discuss package options with your ISP that best fits your preferences.  Just take extra care with those options, in case they have caps that could cause additional charges for streaming data.  Good luck!
I did. They said they cannot do anything about it. They said that that's how the technicians set it.
